source.name: Chaining calls
source.instructions: What is one benefit of chaining API calls when using OpenAI's DALL-E API?

answers.answer: It allows us to generate a single image.
It allows us to create a sequence of images that progressively change.
It reduces the complexity of the outputs.
It limits the creativity of the outputs.

source.guidance: Chaining API calls allows us to generate a sequence of images based on a set of prompts. This can be used for storytelling, progressive image generation, and exploring different variations of the same concept.
